mapper.select: select MY.MNO, MY.PNO, date_format(MY.PCH_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as PCH_DATE, MY.PCH_CNT, MY.IMP_UID, MY.RECEIPT, PUR.TITLE, PUR.PRICE, date_format(PUR.DEV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as DEV_DATE, USER.BAS_ADR, USER.DET_ADR, USER.ZIP, (select MIN(PP.PATH) from PCH_PHOT PP where MY.PNO = PP.PNO) as PATH, (select CP_NAME from COMP where PUR.CPNO = COMP.CPNO) as CP_NAME from PCH_HIST MY left outer join PURCHS PUR on MY.PNO = PUR.PNO left outer join USER on MY.MNO = USER.UNO where MY.MNO=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into PCH_HIST(MNO, PNO, PCH_DATE, PCH_CNT, IMP_UID, RECEIPT) values( #{memberNo}, #{purchaseNo}, now(), #{quantity}, #{imp_uid}, #{receipt} )
